main event: An Unidentified Flying Object was observed between Savannah and Albany, Georgia, with several brilliant lights and unusual behavior.
interesting points: Objects appeared 10 times larger than typical aircraft lights., Objects exhibited rapid ascension and descent patterns., Total of three lights extinguished suddenly., Observation made primarily through ground radar., Reports indicated potential misidentification of bright Venus.
sighted object: brilliant lights and an unidentified flying object
witness description: T/SGT Clifford A. Johnson and an operator at Greenville Air Force Base confirmed the sighting.
